Package updater.util

Utilities collection.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DownloadProgressListener Progress Listener for HTTPDownloader.
Interruptible Support executing tasks after thread be interrupted.
Pausable Support pause and resume action.
 

Class Summary
CommonUtil Common Utilities.
DownloadProgressUtil A tool to calculate/monitor the download speeding and calculate remaining time and download size.
DownloadProgressUtil.Record Feed record used by DownloadProgressUtil.feed(long).
GetClientScriptResult Return result for CommonUtil.getClientScript(java.lang.String).
HTTPDownloader The HTTP downloader.
InterruptibleInputStream Interruptible input stream.
InterruptibleOutputStream Interruptible output stream.
SeekableFile Extend the com.nothome.delta.RandomAccessFileSeekableSource to support pause and thread interrupt.
XMLUtil Utilities for XML manipulation.
XMLUtil.XMLElementNodeList An implementation for XMLUtil.getNodeList(org.w3c.dom.Element, java.lang.String, int, int).
 

Enum Summary
DownloadResult Download result for #download(updater.util.DownloadProgressListener, java.net.URL, java.lang.String, int).
